name: This is a complete web development course:
des: From scratch to teach everything you need to get a job as a junior web developer

name: Unlimited support:
des: Any of your questions will be answered within 24 hours during the course (excluding holidays). Hit the screw

name: Special Interview Preparation Group:
des: Those will work daily. Give 6 to 8 hours every day. Seriously instruct the course with Janpran

name: Job Placement Coach:
des: Those who will get opportunity in SCIC. And it will take just another 4 to 6 weeks to complete. More of them

name: Live Conceptual Sessions:
des: One or two concepts to learn may not be clear to everyone at the first push. This is very normal. With this

name: Advance Crash Course (ACC):
des: You are not just enrolling in a course in programming hero. Rather Life Long is in the mission of learning web development

name: Opportunity to watch offline videos
des: You don't have broadband! Buy mobile data or MB to watch videos? It's like watching the same video over and over again

name: International Job Placement:
des: In the age of globalization, why should your job placement target only be Bangladesh-centric? Rather that of the world
